## **Mapping Census Data**

---

Number of people employed in the farming industry

```{r a, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(choroplethr)
library(choroplethrMaps)
library(ggplot2)

employment = read.csv("census_2000_employment.csv")

head(employment)

farming = data.frame(
  region = employment$STCOU,
  value = employment$Farming
)

county_choropleth(farming, title = "2000 Census Farming Employment", legend = "Count")

```

Percentage of Farming employment by county

```{r b, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

employment$Total = rowSums(employment[, 2:10])

farming = data.frame(
  region = employment$STCOU,
  value = employment$Farming / employment$Total
)

county_choropleth(farming, title = "2000 Census Farming Employment", legend = "Count")


```
